short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to capture and report bugs from your website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture.dev is the easiest way to report bugs and feedback from your website.

With the capture extension you can:

✅ Annotate your website to highlight important feedback quickly.
✅ Capture all of the details that developers need to fix bugs in an instant (no technical knowledge required)
✅ Get an AI summary of technical logs to help understand and prioritise issues at a glance. 
✅ Get automatic reproduction steps for any bug
✅ Automatically send your captures to your favourite issue tracking tool using one of our third-party integrations
